attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As tax payers, motorist, parents and workers we are all frustrated with the constant increases in the costs of living in this Country with very little support from the Government. Gordon Brown has let us all down and is still trying to dig himself out of a hole. Move on, let the public decide, it's our Country!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
